lines.name: Kaom's Sign

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Enduring Cry Skill
+(2-4) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (2-4) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
+(10-24) to Strength
+1 to Maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
A token from the sea
A sign for Kaom
to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

lines.name: Malachai's Artifice

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems have Elemental Equilibrium
-(30-20)% to all Elemental Resistances
+(75-120)% to Fire Resistance when Socketed with a Red Gem
+(75-120)% to Cold Resistance when Socketed with a Green Gem
All Sockets are White
+(75-120)% to Lightning Resistance when Socketed with a Blue Gem

lines.flavourText:
When the wind blows, 
Know which way to bend
and watch the others break.

lines.name: Feastbind

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-6) to (10-12) Physical Damage to Attacks
+(20-48) to maximum Life
(0.2-0.24)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Flask Charges gained during any Flask Effect
(50-60)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Our forefathers danced and drank and ate their fill
and did not honour the First Ones for their gifts.
So the First Ones filled the sky with fire.

lines.name: Eye of Chayula

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 20% reduced maximum Life
30% increased Rarity of Items found
Cannot be Stunned

lines.flavourText:
Never blinking, always watching.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula}

lines.name: Thief's Torment

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Rarity of Items found
(10-25)% increased Quantity of Items found
Can't use other Rings
+(8-48)% to all Elemental Resistances
+(20-72) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (20-72) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
+(15-36) Mana gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (15-36) Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
(50-60)% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText:
The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

lines.name: Valyrium

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(10-48) to maximum Energy Shield
+(20-48)% to Fire Resistance
-(48-40)% to Cold Resistance
Stun Threshold is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText: They will rise and fall in fire and blood.

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-80) to maximum Life
+(20-40) to maximum Mana
20% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
20% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Items and Gems have 10% reduced Attribute Requirements
Items and Gems have 10% increased Attribute Requirements
5% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Always Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Cannot gain Power Charges

lines.name: Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-19) to (7-38) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (2-14) to (5-33) Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to (13-81) Lightning Damage to Attacks
+(6-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills during any Flask Effect
(10-12)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle
